body:
[Jump to issue](#issue)

Output of `helm version`: 

```shell
➜ helm version    
version.BuildInfo{Version:"v3.9.4", GitCommit:"dbc6d8e20fe1d58d50e6ed30f09a04a77e4c68db", GitTreeState:"clean", GoVersion:"go1.17.13"}
```

Output of `kubectl version`:

```shell
➜ kubectl version

```

Cloud Provider/Platform (AKS, GKE, Minikube etc.):  GKE, v1.24.3-gke.2100


# Issue

When creating a new helm chart using `helm create <chart>` the HPA is using an old outdated and soon to be deprecated version

<details>
<summary>Warning</summary>

_note: Task is just a better version of makefile, the command it runs is `helm upgrade <reelase> <chart>

```shell
➜ task upgrade
task: [upgrade] helm upgrade $releaseName $chart
W1102 13:34:17.245653   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler
W1102 13:34:17.269708   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler
W1102 13:34:20.310690   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler
W1102 13:34:20.438095   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler
W1102 13:34:20.463040   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler
W1102 13:34:20.488023   42748 warnings.go:70] autoscaling/v2beta1 HorizontalPodAutoscaler is deprecated in v1.22+, unavailable in v1.25+; use autoscaling/v2 HorizontalPodAutoscaler

```
</details>


The Deprecation notice is [Here](https://kubernetes.io/docs/reference/using-api/deprecation-guide/#horizontalpodautoscaler-v126)

What would be nice to see is the New version:
